lead_paragraph: FOLK--Eleanor M.,of Astoria, NY on June 24, 2016 at the age of 93. Beloved wife of the late Richard "Buddy." Loving mother of Richard H. Folk III (Ann), Eleanor A. Mule (Lawrence), and Ann C. Kurinskas (James). Cherished by her eight grandchildren and two great-grandchildren. Adored sister of Mark McGowan, Jr. Family will receive friends Tuesday, 7-9pm, and Wednesday 2-5pm and 7-9pm, at the Charles J. O'Shea Funeral Home, 603 Wantagh Ave (Exit 28N SS Pkwy) Wantagh, NY. Mass of Christian Burial will be held Thursday, 10:00am, at St. Frances de Chantal R.C. Church. Interment to follow at Mount St. Mary's Cemetery. www.osheafuneral.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FOLK, ELEANOR M.
